Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: A macaronic hymn to the Virgin Mary — seven 12-line stanzas, including refrain, ‘Maria virgo virginum’

CamMagPep1236.First Lines:
Regina celi and lady letarelemyng sely & in place of
                    syght…
CamMagPep1236.Last Lines:
…to se thy trone & thy tresoureMaria virgo
                    virginum
CamMagPep1236.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 49-52.
